name: Imperium Cerebri (adele.zemdikhanova)
description:
IMPERIUM CEREBRI

By Group 16 

Prompt: Drop in the bucket

You’re trapped in the Layward Factory and the mindless former worker puppets are closing in, FAST. Can you escape? 

Try to fight off and survive the swarms and collect all the clues to find out how and why has the world deteriorated. 

Controls: 

  • WASD for movement
  • Right Mouse Click for shooting
  • SPACE for planting bait
  • M for map
  • Esc for exit

Team:

  • Boglárka Kiss: Lead Artist, 2D Animator
  • Adele Zemdikhanova: Project Manager, Scrum Master, 2D Artist
  • Alejandro Batalla: Programmer, QA, UI Design 
  • Adarsh Kumar: Lead Programmer
  • Liv Coro: Programmer, Audio Design, Music, Narrative Design
  • Laura Pham: Concept Artist, UI Artist

GD2 Shoot' em up
